channel.title: How to Change the ip on 667/728 Client's (1% FIX) W/pics
channel.description:
Hope this Tutorial will help each one of you that are having Problems whit 667/728 client's :D
Install Jre7 here: [url=http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp]http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp[/url] [b](everyone that will play the server need it)[/b]
Install JDK here: [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7u9-downloads-1859576.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7u9-downloads-1859576.html[/url] [b](Only you will need this)[/b]
[b](For some 1% problems this will fix it all)[/b] Change the Java in the Run.bar file in client folder to Jre7 instead after dowlnoadin jre7. [img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/9339/sdfgsdfgsdfg.png[/img]
[u][b]HOW TO CHANGE THE IP'S IN CLIENT FOLDER:[/b][/u] Go into the Client Folder and Search after: Loader.Java 1. Right click the file and press edit [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/682/loaderjavaedit.png[/img] 2. Search after this: [i][b]public static final String SERVER_IP = [/b][/i]"127.0.0.1"; (You can also Just scroll down a bit and you will see it) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img707/8756/127001cahnge.png[/img] 3. Copy the Ip that were there before and put in you'r own ([b]YOU WILL NEED THE IP THAT WERE THERE BEFORE[/b]) 4. Save the loader.java file.
Now Search after GameStub.java 1.right click and edit 2. press CTRL + F and search after the ip that were in the loader.java before and change it to your own ip (2 places were u need to change the ip in GameStub) [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img138/9265/changegj.png[/img] [b]Now do the same that you did whit the GameStub.java file whit the Client.java file and save[/b]
[b]HOW TO COMPILE YOUR CLIENT AFTERWARDS:[/b]
1. Be sure that you have dowloaded the newest JDK for you'r Computer 2. Right click you'r compiler and press edit, Most of you will see this: [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img255/3852/compiljava.png[/img] Now go into your [b]C:\Program Files\Java[/b] and you will see a folder that are named jdk1.7.x_xx 3.Right click the folder and click rename and copy the folder name and replace the Jdk that were there before to your's and save. [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img11/5011/javahp.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img138/920/replaced.png[/img] 4. now double click the compiler and it will run and wait until it's finished. [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/6598/finishedcompiling.png[/img]
[u][b]HOW TO GIVE IT OVER TO YOUR FRIENDS:[/b][/u] First download Winrar here: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm
1. right click you'r Client folder and click Add to [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/6463/startrarfileing.png[/img]
2. when finsihed you will get a .Rar file, now go to http://uppit.com/ and upload it and send the URL to your friends [b](EVERYONE THAT ARE GOING TO DOWNLOAD THE CLIENT NEED 7ZIP OR WINRAR)[/b]
[s][u][i][b]HAPPY PRIVATE SERVERING! <3[/b][/i][/u][/s]
-Darkeh

item.title: How to Change the ip on 667/728 Client's (1% FIX) W/pics
item.dc:creator: @darkzcap3 darkzcap3
item.description:
@darkzcap3 wrote:

Hope this Tutorial will help each one of you that are having Problems whit 667/728 client’s

Install Jre7 here: http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp
(everyone that will play the server need it)

Install JDK here: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7u9-downloads-1859576.html
(Only you will need this)

(For some 1% problems this will fix it all)
Change the Java in the Run.bar file in client folder to Jre7 instead after dowlnoadin jre7.

HOW TO CHANGE THE IP’S IN CLIENT FOLDER:
Go into the Client Folder and Search after: Loader.Java

  1. Right click the file and press edit
  2. Search after this:
    public static final String SERVER_IP = “127.0.0.1”;
    (You can also Just scroll down a bit and you will see it)
  3. Copy the Ip that were there before and put in you’r own (YOU WILL NEED THE IP THAT WERE THERE BEFORE)
  4. Save the loader.java file.

Now Search after GameStub.java
1.right click and edit
2. press CTRL + F and search after the ip that were in the loader.java before and change it to your own ip
(2 places were u need to change the ip in GameStub)

Now do the same that you did whit the GameStub.java file whit the Client.java file and save

HOW TO COMPILE YOUR CLIENT AFTERWARDS:

  1. Be sure that you have dowloaded the newest JDK for you’r Computer
  2. Right click you’r compiler and press edit, Most of you will see this:

    Now go into your C:\Program Files\Java and you will see a folder that are named jdk1.7.x_xx
    3.Right click the folder and click rename and copy the folder name and replace the Jdk that were there before to your’s
    and save.

  3. now double click the compiler and it will run and wait until it’s finished.

HOW TO GIVE IT OVER TO YOUR FRIENDS:
First download Winrar here: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

  1. right click you’r Client folder and click Add to

  2. when finsihed you will get a .Rar file, now go to http://uppit.com/ and upload it and send the URL to your friends
    (EVERYONE THAT ARE GOING TO DOWNLOAD THE CLIENT NEED 7ZIP OR WINRAR)

HAPPY PRIVATE SERVERING! <3

-Darkeh
